settings.title: Meet The Beast: The last dog bed you'll ever need.
settings.content:
Does your furry friend constantly destroy their bed? We get it. Replacing cheap beds is frustrating, and seeing your pup uncomfortable is heartbreaking.

Introducing The Beast, the ultra-tough orthopedic dog bed built for diggers, chewers, and messy pups. It eliminates worries about scratches, tears, and accidents, offering peace of mind for you and a comfy haven for them.

settings.text: My dog finally met his match with The Beast. So much better than other "ballistic" products I have purchased. Worth every penny!
The Beast is a lifesaver for my messy Newfie! Its waterproof & comfy. My pup is happy, and most importantly, there are no more soggy messes!!
My Doxie finally has a bed that supports his back. Super comfy, washes well. No more morning stiffness, just happy jumps!

settings.title: Built to Last a Lifetime
settings.text: Indestructible? You bet. Our triple-layered, recycled fabric laughs at scratches, tears, and punctures. Perfect for rambunctious pups who love to dig and chew.

settings.title: Unmatched Comfort & Support
settings.text: Rest easy knowing your dog is sleeping on orthopedic foam that supports their joints and muscles for better, restorative sleep.

settings.title: Cleanliness Made Easy
settings.text: Accidents happen. But with a machine-washable cover treated with StayFresh™ eco-tech, odors and bacteria are banished. More playtime, less laundry!

settings.title: Fused Core™ Mattress
settings.text: Our innovative mattress is built tough. 100% waterproof and heat-welded seams make cleaning a breeze. No more soggy beds or hidden messes!
Black Lab Beds
A sanctuary of comfort and resilience for pups that are tough on their beds.

settings.title: Free Shipping
settings.text: Free shipping on orders over $75 within the contiguous US.Learn more

settings.title: 120 Day Warranty
settings.text: We stand behind our products. Rest easy with durability you can trust.Learn More

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.text: Bluesign®, SpinDye®, Oeko-Tex®, GRS®, Certi-Pur US® & More.Learn More

settings.title: Returns/Exchanges
settings.text: Easy Returns and Exchanges. Our customer assistance team is here to help.Learn More

settings.heading: How are Black Lab's Tough Beds Better?

settings.text:
Tougher & More Durable
Cleaner & More Hygienic
Eco-conscious & Comfortable

Our premium water proof tough covers, last longer, stay cleaner, and fight odor causing bacteria.

Your mattress is the bed's core, essential for comfort and hygiene. When foam gets wet, it retains odor and bacteria, posing a problem as it cannot be washed. Traditional mattress covers, regardless of material, have weak seams vulnerable to moisture. Our mattress is crafted from durable, waterproof material with heat-welded seams, ensuring longevity and hygiene. One of a kind innovation, you'll only find here.
Better than Ballistic™

Tougher & More Durable
Cleaner & More Hygienic
Eco-conscious & Comfortable

Our fabric goes Beyond Ballistic™, offering a triple-layered textile that surpasses "Ballistic" fabrics in comfort and resilience.

Our premium water proof tough covers, last longer, stay cleaner, and fight odor causing bacteria.

Your mattress is the bed's core, essential for comfort and hygiene. When foam gets wet, it retains odor and bacteria, posing a problem as it cannot be washed. Traditional mattress covers, regardless of material, have weak seams vulnerable to moisture. Our mattress is crafted from durable, waterproof material with heat-welded seams, ensuring longevity and hygiene. One of a kind innovation, you'll only find here.
Black Lab Innovation: Modern Versatility
The Trailblazer merges style, comfort, and durability for dogs on the move.

Ultimate Comfort.

Maximum Hygiene.

Tough-as-Nails.

Premium Quality.
Our dog beds and gear are designed to wear in, not out. They offer unmatched performance, are sustainably made, and responsibly manufactured.
